content:
Hi, I’m Kay! I am a multidisciplinary artist and engineer, with over a decade of experience in full-stack software engineering, in addition to IT experience; and more recently, I have written and directed subversive and genre-bending immersive theater experiences through my production company, Holy Bone! Productions.

My dream is to combine my technical expertise with my loves for performing and for game design to create immersive live experiences which push the boundaries of interactivity.

I am also available for freelance coding work. If you would like to hire me, drop me a line.
title: kayfab.me
